data.eml:eml: A new species of Scinax Wagler (Anura: Hylidae) from Paraná, Southern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Conte, Carlos E., Araujo-Vieira, Katyuscia, Crivellari, Lucas B., Berneck, Bianca V. M. (2016): A new species of Scinax Wagler (Anura: Hylidae) from Paraná, Southern Brazil. Zootaxa 4193 (2): 245-265, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4193.2.3
